Posts.Content: Apr 19, 2010 11:51PM - edited Apr 20, 2010 05:59PM by cwbagne79 Yunlee - I am very similar to you, diagnosed 2/2/2010, 48 yrs. old - my tumor was 2.3cm X 2.0 cm, IDC, node negative, ER+ & PR+, Her -, grade 1.  My Oncotype DX score was 15.  There is some very important paperwork that comes with your Oncotype Score - interpretation - from the company that ran the test.  This should have been discussed with you by the Medical Oncologist.  There is little to no benefit for you taking chemo.  You do not have a metastatic cancer.  I hope that you will get to see these papers and study them well.  There is much data (not limited) on this test and a score of 17 is something to have a party about - NO CHEMO!  WOO HOO!!  Please don't let fear control any decisions about Breast Cancer treatment.   Best of luck, to all Breast Cancer gals!!
Posts.Title: StageIIA, Oncotype 17- NO CHEMO, Are you Agree? yunlee72 ColoGal
